page.title: 03JOE,THE SCHOOL CARETAKER
page.content: Joe has looked after both the junior and the infant schools on Danesholme for about 7 years.Before that he used to look after the junior school,and there was a chief caretaker who was responsible for both schools,now there is only Joe.He lives in the school house which is provided for him.From his house he can watch over the schools at weekends and in the holidays,when he cleans both schools. He gets up at{six}in the morning so that he can open both schools by seven.At dinner time he sets up the dinner tables in both schools.When school finishes Joe has to clean.He has{6 cleaners}for{2 hours}helping him Joe is 58 and was born in Scotland near Inverness.He came to Corby to work in the{steel works,}but ever since he has lived in Corby he has had different jobs.
